description.text:
If the data set at hand prodives an id attribute the id is presented as tool tip text at the mouse pointer above a plotter data point. It the experiment contains an ExampleVisualizer operator the user can make a double-click on a data point which creates a data view of the selected data point. Other, more special, visualizers exist which opens a text viewer for text data experiments or an Audio player in case of music data.
Please note that the example set visualization feature is currently only available for the scatter plotter.
